name: Samson Goes to the Barber
description:
Z Undo

R Restart

Click this link to play the game on mobile: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=8b56b94559913b0e8628f49ad6477313

A short game made in three hours for the Friday Night Game Jam - #2020-39 - Theme: Eye For An Eye.

Samson's hair is the source of his strength, but it's become too large for him to fit through doorways. Will you give up his strength in exchange for mobility?

Made using PuzzleScript.  https://www.puzzlescript.net/
